Original.name: OperatingExpenseExcludingCostOfSales
Original.description: Operating Expense Excluding Cost of Sales

Original.name: ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities
Original.description: Profit and Loss from Operating Activities

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets whose underlying assets would be presented as property, plant and equipment if they were owned. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Right-of-use assets]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of tangible assets that: (a) are held for use in the production or supply of goods or services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes; and (b) are expected to be used during more than one period. Note that right-of-use assets are not included. [Contrast: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: RightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of assets that represent a lessee's right to use an underlying asset for the lease term that do not meet the definition of investment property. Underlying asset is an asset that is the subject of a lease, for which the right to use that asset has been provided by a lessor to a lessee.

Original.name: InvestmentProperty
Original.description: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee as a right-of-use asset) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business.

Original.name: Goodwill
Original.description: The amount of assets representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognised. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
Original.description: The amount of identifiable non-monetary assets without physical substance. This amount does not include goodwill. [Refer: Goodwill]

Original.name: InvestmentAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

Original.name: InvestmentsInSubsidiariesJointVenturesAndAssociates
Original.description: The amount of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Total for all subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries reported in separate financial statements]

Original.name: NoncurrentBiologicalAssets
Original.description: The amount of non-current biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

Original.name: NoncurrentReceivables
Original.description: The amount of non-current trade receivables and non-current other receivables. [Refer: Non-current trade receivables; Other non-current receivables]

Original.name: NoncurrentInventories
Original.description: The amount of non-current inventories. [Refer: Inventories]

Original.name: DeferredTaxAssets
Original.description: The amounts of income taxes recoverable in future periods in respect of: (a) deductible temporary differences; (b) the carryforward of unused tax losses; and (c) the carryforward of unused tax credits. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax credits [member]; Unused tax losses [member]]

Original.name: CurrentTaxAssetsNoncurrent
Original.description: The non-current amount of current tax assets. [Refer: Current tax assets]

Original.name: OtherNoncurrentFinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of non-current financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial assets]

Original.name: OtherNoncurrentNonfinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of non-current non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

Original.name: NoncurrentNoncashAssetsPledgedAsCollateralForWhichTransfereeHasRightByContractOrCustomToSellOrRepledgeCollateral
Original.description: The amount of non-current non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

Original.name: NoncurrentAssets
Original.description: The amount of assets that do not meet the definition of current assets. [Refer: Current assets]

Original.name: Inventories
Original.description: The amount of current inventories. [Refer: Inventories]

Original.name: TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivables
Original.description: The amount of current trade receivables and current other receivables. [Refer: Current trade receivables; Other current receivables]

Original.name: CurrentTaxAssetsCurrent
Original.description: The current amount of current tax assets. [Refer: Current tax assets]

Original.name: CurrentBiologicalAssets
Original.description: The amount of current biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

Original.name: OtherCurrentFinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of current financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial assets; Current financial assets]

Original.name: OtherCurrentNonfinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of current non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

Original.name: CashAndCashEquivalents
Original.description: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

Original.name: CurrentNoncashAssetsPledgedAsCollateralForWhichTransfereeHasRightByContractOrCustomToSellOrRepledgeCollateral
Original.description: The amount of current non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

Original.name: CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners
Original.description: The amount of current assets other than non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Current assets; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners]

Original.name: NoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners
Original.description: The amount of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale]

Original.name: CurrentAssets
Original.description: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

Original.name: Assets
Original.description: The amount of a present economic resource controlled by the entity as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

Original.name: IssuedCapital
Original.description: The nominal value of capital issued.

Original.name: RetainedEarnings
Original.description: A component of equity representing the entity's cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit.

Original.name: SharePremium
Original.description: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value.

Original.name: TreasuryShares
Original.description: An entity’s own equity instruments, held by the entity or other members of the consolidated group.

Original.name: OtherEquityInterest
Original.description: The amount of equity interest of an entity without share capital that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

Original.name: OtherReserves
Original.description: A component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings]

Original.name: EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent
Original.description: The amount of equity attributable to the owners of the parent. This specifically excludes non-controlling interest.

Original.name: NoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The amount of equity in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to a parent. [Refer: Total for all subsidiaries [member]]

Original.name: Equity
Original.description: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

Original.name: NoncurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits
Original.description: The amount of non-current provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions for employee benefits]

Original.name: OtherLongtermProvisions
Original.description: The amount of non-current provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Non-current provisions]

Original.name: NoncurrentProvisions
Original.description: The amount of non-current provisions, including provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

Original.name: NoncurrentPayables
Original.description: The amount of non-current trade payables and non-current other payables. [Refer: Other non-current payables; Non-current trade payables]

Original.name: DeferredTaxLiabilities
Original.description: The amounts of income taxes payable in future periods in respect of taxable temporary differences. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

Original.name: CurrentTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
Original.description: The non-current amount of current tax liabilities. [Refer: Current tax liabilities]

Original.name: OtherNoncurrentFinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

Original.name: OtherNoncurrentNonfinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of non-current non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

Original.name: NoncurrentLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that do not meet the definition of current liabilities. [Refer: Current liabilities]

Original.name: CurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits
Original.description: The amount of current provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions for employee benefits]

Original.name: OtherShorttermProvisions
Original.description: The amount of current provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

Original.name: CurrentProvisions
Original.description: The amount of current provisions, including provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

Original.name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayables
Original.description: The amount of current trade payables and current other payables. [Refer: Current trade payables; Other current payables]

Original.name: CurrentTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
Original.description: The current amount of current tax liabilities. [Refer: Current tax liabilities]

Original.name: OtherCurrentFinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities; Current financial liabilities]

Original.name: OtherCurrentNonfinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

Original.name: CurrentLiabilitiesOtherThanLiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale
Original.description: The amount of current liabilities other than liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Current liabilities; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale]

Original.name: LiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale
Original.description: The amount of liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Liabilities; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

Original.name: CurrentLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have the right at the end of the reporting period to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

Original.name: Liabilities
Original.description: The amount of a present obligation of the entity to transfer an economic resource as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

Original.name: EquityAndLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of the entity's equity and liabilities. [Refer: Equity; Liabilities]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets whose underlying assets would be presented as property, plant and equipment if they were owned. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Right-of-use assets]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of tangible assets that: (a) are held for use in the production or supply of goods or services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes; and (b) are expected to be used during more than one period. Note that right-of-use assets are not included. [Contrast: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: RightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of assets that represent a lessee's right to use an underlying asset for the lease term that do not meet the definition of investment property. Underlying asset is an asset that is the subject of a lease, for which the right to use that asset has been provided by a lessor to a lessee.

Original.name: InvestmentProperty
Original.description: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee as a right-of-use asset) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business.

Original.name: Goodwill
Original.description: The amount of assets representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognised. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill
Original.description: The amount of identifiable non-monetary assets without physical substance. This amount does not include goodwill. [Refer: Goodwill]

Original.name: OtherFinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

Original.name: OtherNonfinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

Original.name: InsuranceContractsIssuedThatAreAssets
Original.description: The amount of insurance contracts issued that are assets. [Refer: Assets; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: ReinsuranceContractsHeldThatAreAssets
Original.description: The amount of reinsurance contracts held that are assets. [Refer: Assets; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

Original.name: InvestmentAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

Original.name: InvestmentsInSubsidiariesJointVenturesAndAssociates
Original.description: The amount of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Total for all subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries reported in separate financial statements]

Original.name: BiologicalAssets
Original.description: The amount of living animals or plants recognised as assets.

Original.name: NoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners
Original.description: The amount of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale]

Original.name: InventoriesTotal
Original.description: The amount of assets: (a) held for sale in the ordinary course of business; (b) in the process of production for such sale; or (c) in the form of materials or supplies to be consumed in the production process or in the rendering of services. Inventories encompass goods purchased and held for resale including, for example, merchandise purchased by a retailer and held for resale, or land and other property held for resale. Inventories also encompass finished goods produced, or work in progress being produced, by the entity and include materials and supplies awaiting use in the production process. [Refer: Current finished goods; Current merchandise; Current work in progress; Land]

Original.name: CurrentTaxAssets
Original.description: The excess of amount paid for current tax in respect of current and prior periods over the amount due for those periods. Current tax is the amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

Original.name: DeferredTaxAssets
Original.description: The amounts of income taxes recoverable in future periods in respect of: (a) deductible temporary differences; (b) the carryforward of unused tax losses; and (c) the carryforward of unused tax credits. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax credits [member]; Unused tax losses [member]]

Original.name: TradeAndOtherReceivables
Original.description: The amount of trade receivables and other receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables; Other receivables]

Original.name: CashAndCashEquivalents
Original.description: The amount of cash on hand and demand deposits, along with short-term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and that are subject to an insignificant risk of changes in value. [Refer: Cash; Cash equivalents]

Original.name: NoncashAssetsPledgedAsCollateralForWhichTransfereeHasRightByContractOrCustomToSellOrRepledgeCollateral
Original.description: The amount of non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

Original.name: Assets
Original.description: The amount of a present economic resource controlled by the entity as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

Original.name: IssuedCapital
Original.description: The nominal value of capital issued.

Original.name: RetainedEarnings
Original.description: A component of equity representing the entity's cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit.

Original.name: SharePremium
Original.description: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value.

Original.name: TreasuryShares
Original.description: An entity’s own equity instruments, held by the entity or other members of the consolidated group.

Original.name: OtherEquityInterest
Original.description: The amount of equity interest of an entity without share capital that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

Original.name: OtherReserves
Original.description: A component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings]

Original.name: EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent
Original.description: The amount of equity attributable to the owners of the parent. This specifically excludes non-controlling interest.

Original.name: NoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The amount of equity in a subsidiary not attributable, directly or indirectly, to a parent. [Refer: Total for all subsidiaries [member]]

Original.name: Equity
Original.description: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

Original.name: TradeAndOtherPayables
Original.description: The amount of trade payables and other payables. [Refer: Trade payables; Other payables]

Original.name: ProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits
Original.description: The amount of provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Employee benefits expenses, operating; Provisions]

Original.name: OtherProvisions
Original.description: The amount of provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

Original.name: Provisions
Original.description: The amount of liabilities of uncertain timing or amount, including provisions for employee benefits.

Original.name: OtherFinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

Original.name: OtherNonfinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

Original.name: InsuranceContractsIssuedThatAreLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of insurance contracts issued that are liabilities. [Refer: Liabilities; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: ReinsuranceContractsHeldThatAreLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of reinsurance contracts held that are liabilities. [Refer: Liabilities; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

Original.name: CurrentTaxLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current tax for current and prior periods to the extent unpaid. Current tax is the amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

Original.name: DeferredTaxLiabilities
Original.description: The amounts of income taxes payable in future periods in respect of taxable temporary differences. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

Original.name: LiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale
Original.description: The amount of liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Liabilities; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

Original.name: Liabilities
Original.description: The amount of a present obligation of the entity to transfer an economic resource as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

Original.name: EquityAndLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of the entity's equity and liabilities. [Refer: Equity; Liabilities]

Original.name: Revenue
Original.description: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Income is increases in assets, or decreases in liabilities, that result in increases in equity, other than those relating to contributions from holders of equity claims.

Original.name: CostOfSales
Original.description: The amount of all expenses directly or indirectly attributed to the goods or services sold, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Attributed expenses include, but are not limited to, costs previously included in the measurement of inventory that has now been sold, such as depreciation and maintenance of factory buildings and equipment used in the production process, unallocated production overheads, and abnormal amounts of production costs of inventories.

Original.name: GrossProfit
Original.description: The amount of revenue less cost of sales, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Cost of sales, operating; Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromRoyalties
Original.description: The amount of income arising from royalties, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: LicenceFeeIncome
Original.description: The amount of income arising from licence fees, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: FranchiseFeeIncome
Original.description: The amount of income arising from franchise fees, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: SellingExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense relating to selling activities of the entity, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense relating to general and administrative activities of the entity, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense
Original.description: The amount of expenditure directly attributable to research or development activities, recognised in profit or loss, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ChangesInInventoriesOfFinishedGoodsAndWorkInProgress
Original.description: The decrease (increase) in inventories of finished goods and work in progress, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Inventories; Current finished goods; Current work in progress]

Original.name: OtherWorkPerformedByEntityAndCapitalised
Original.description: The amount of the entity's own work capitalised from items originally classified as costs that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: RawMaterialsAndConsumablesUsed
Original.description: The amount of raw materials and consumables used in the production process or in the rendering of services, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Current raw materials]

Original.name: EmployeeBenefitsExpense
Original.description: The expense of all forms of consideration given by an entity in exchange for a service rendered by employees or for the termination of employment, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: DepreciationExpense
Original.description: The amount of depreciation expense, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Depreciation is the systematic allocation of depreciable amounts of tangible assets over their useful lives.

Original.name: AmortisationExpense
Original.description: The amount of amortisation expense, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Amortisation is the systematic allocation of depreciable amounts of intangible assets over their useful lives.

Original.name: DepreciationAndAmortisationExpenseOperating
Original.description: The amount of depreciation and amortisation expense, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Depreciation and amortisation are the systematic allocations of depreciable amounts of assets over their useful lives.

Original.name: ImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossOperating
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss or reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss]

Original.name: DepreciationAmortisationAndImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of depreciation expense, amortisation expense and impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) recognised in profit or loss, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) recognised in profit or loss, operating]

Original.name: TradingIncomeExpense
Original.description: The amount of income (expense) relating to trading assets and liabilities, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: OtherOperatingIncomeExpense
Original.description: The amount of operating income (expense) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationRecognisedInProfitOrLossOperating
Original.description: The amount of exchange differences recognised in profit or loss that arise from foreign currency transactions, excluding those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossGoodwill
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for goodwill, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Goodwill]

Original.name: HedgingGainsLossesForHedgeOfGroupOfItemsWithOffsettingRiskPositions
Original.description: The hedging gains (losses) for hedge of group of items with offsetting risk positions, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: DifferenceBetweenCarryingAmountOfDividendsPayableAndCarryingAmountOfNoncashAssetsDistributed
Original.description: The amount of difference between the carrying amount of dividends payable and the carrying amount of non-cash assets distributed when settling the dividends payable, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnNetMonetaryPositionOperating
Original.description: The gains (losses) representing the difference resulting from the restatement of non-monetary assets, owners' equity and items in the statement of comprehensive income and the adjustment of index linked assets and liabilities in hyperinflationary reporting, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GainsLossesOnFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossOperating
Original.description: The gains (losses) on financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnFairValueAdjustmentInvestmentPropertyOperating
Original.description: The gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investment property, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Investment property]

Original.name: ImpairmentLossImpairmentGainAndReversalOfImpairmentLossDeterminedInAccordanceWithIFRS9Operating
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss, impairment gain or reversal of impairment loss that is recognised in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 5.5.8 of IFRS 9 and that arises from applying the impairment requirements in Section 5.5 of IFRS 9, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GainLossArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCostOperating
Original.description: The gain (loss) arising from the derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

Original.name: GainsLossesArisingFromDifferenceBetweenPreviousCarryingAmountAndFairValueOfFinancialAssetsReclassifiedAsMeasuredAtFairValueOperating
Original.description: The gains (losses) arising from the difference between the previous amortised cost and the fair value of financial assets reclassified out of the amortised cost into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets at amortised cost]

Original.name: CumulativeGainLossPreviouslyRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeArisingFromReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsOutOfFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeIntoFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasurementCategoryOperating
Original.description: The cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from the reclassification of financial assets out of the fair value through other comprehensive income into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: InsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that is recognised in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: FinanceIncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held that is recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

Original.name: RevenueFromDividends
Original.description: The amount of dividends recognised as income, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Dividends are distributions of profits to holders of equity investments in proportion to their holdings of a particular class of capital.

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossLoansAndAdvances
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for loans and advances, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss]

Original.name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossLoansAndAdvances
Original.description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for loans and advances, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss]

Original.name: ImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossLoansAndAdvances
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss or reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for loans and advances, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss]

Original.name: GainsOnDisposalsOfInvestmentProperties
Original.description: The gain on disposals of investment properties, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Investment property]

Original.name: LossesOnDisposalsOfInvestmentProperties
Original.description: The losses on disposals of investment properties, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Investment property]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnDisposalsOfInvestmentProperties
Original.description: The gains (losses) on disposals of investment properties, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Investment property]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossOperating
Original.description: The total of all income and expenses classified in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnDisposalsOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesInvesting
Original.description: The amount of gains (losses) on disposals of associates and joint ventures presented in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: InvestmentIncomeInvesting
Original.description: The amount of investment income, such as interest and dividends, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: RevenueFromDividendsInvesting
Original.description: The amount of dividends recognised as income, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. Dividends are distributions of profits to holders of equity investments in proportion to their holdings of a particular class of capital.

Original.name: DepreciationAmortisationAndImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossInvesting
Original.description: The amount of depreciation expense, amortisation expense and impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) recognised in profit or loss, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) recognised in profit or loss]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnDisposalsOfInvestmentsInvesting
Original.description: The gains (losses) on disposals of investments, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GainsLossesOnFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossInvesting
Original.description: The gains (losses) on financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnFairValueAdjustmentInvestmentPropertyInvesting
Original.description: The gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investment property, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Investment property]

Original.name: InterestRevenueCalculatedUsingEffectiveInterestMethodInvesting
Original.description: The amount of interest revenue calculated using the effective interest method, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. Effective interest method is the method that is used in the calculation of the amortised cost of a financial asset or a financial liability and in the allocation and recognition of the interest revenue or interest expense in profit or loss over the relevant period. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: ImpairmentLossImpairmentGainAndReversalOfImpairmentLossDeterminedInAccordanceWithIFRS9Investing
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss, impairment gain or reversal of impairment loss that is recognised in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 5.5.8 of IFRS 9 and that arises from applying the impairment requirements in Section 5.5 of IFRS 9, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GainLossArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCostInvesting
Original.description: The gain (loss) arising from the derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

Original.name: GainsLossesArisingFromDifferenceBetweenPreviousCarryingAmountAndFairValueOfFinancialAssetsReclassifiedAsMeasuredAtFairValueInvesting
Original.description: The gains (losses) arising from the difference between the previous amortised cost and the fair value of financial assets reclassified out of the amortised cost into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets at amortised cost]

Original.name: CumulativeGainLossPreviouslyRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeArisingFromReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsOutOfFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeIntoFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasurementCategoryInvesting
Original.description: The cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from the reclassification of financial assets out of the fair value through other comprehensive income into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: RentalIncomeInvesting
Original.description: The amount of income recognised from rental activities, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationRecognisedInProfitOrLossInvesting
Original.description: The amount of exchange differences recognised in profit or loss that arise from foreign currency transactions, excluding those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ProfitLossBeforeFinancingAndIncomeTaxes
Original.description: The profit (loss) before financing and income tax expense or income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: InterestExpenseFinancing
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from interest, in the financing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Interest expense]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossFinancing
Original.description: The gains (losses) on financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, in the financing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationRecognisedInProfitOrLossFinancing
Original.description: The amount of exchange differences recognised in profit or loss that arise from foreign currency transactions, excluding those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9, in the financing category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ProfitLossBeforeTax
Original.description: The profit (loss) before income tax expense or income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations
Original.description: The aggregate amount included in the determination of profit (loss) for the period in respect of current tax and deferred tax, in the income taxes category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Current tax expense (income), income taxes; Deferred tax expense (income)]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationRecognisedInProfitOrLossIncomeTaxes
Original.description: The amount of exchange differences recognised in profit or loss that arise from foreign currency transactions, excluding those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9, in the income taxes category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperations
Original.description: The profit (loss) from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations, unless line item indicates otherwise [member]; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperations
Original.description: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations, in the discontinued operations category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ProfitLoss
Original.description: The total of income less expenses from continuing and discontinued operations, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent
Original.description: The profit (loss) from continuing and discontinued operations attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The profit (loss) from continuing and discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss); Non-controlling interests]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossBeforeDepreciationAmortisationAndImpairmentsOperating
Original.description: The operating profit or loss before depreciation, amortisation and impairments within the scope of IAS 36 Impairment of Assets. [Refer: Operating profit (loss), operating]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossAndIncomeExpensesFromAllInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The operating profit or loss and income and expenses from all investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Operating profit (loss), operating]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossAndAllIncomeExpensesClassifiedInInvestingCategory
Original.description: The operating profit or loss and all income and expenses classified in the investing category.

Original.name: InterestRevenueCalculatedUsingEffectiveInterestMethodOperating
Original.description: The amount of interest revenue calculated using the effective interest method, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Effective interest method is the method that is used in the calculation of the amortised cost of a financial asset or a financial liability and in the allocation and recognition of the interest revenue or interest expense in profit or loss over the relevant period. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: InterestExpenseOperating
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from interest, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Interest expense]

Original.name: InterestRevenueExpense
Original.description: The amount of income and expense arising from interest, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Interest expense, operating; Interest revenue calculated using effective interest method, operating]

Original.name: InsuranceRevenue
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the groups of insurance contracts issued, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Insurance revenue shall depict the provision of services arising from the group of insurance contracts at an amount that reflects the consideration to which the entity expects to be entitled in exchange for those services. [Refer: Insurance contracts issued [member]; Revenue, operating]

Original.name: InsuranceServiceExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssued
Original.description: The amount of expenses arising from a group of insurance contracts issued, comprising incurred claims (excluding repayments of investment components), other incurred insurance service expenses, amortisation of insurance acquisition cash flows, changes that relate to past service and changes that relate to future service, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: IncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldOtherThanFinanceIncomeExpenses
Original.description: The amount of income (expenses) from a group of reinsurance contracts held, other than finance income (expenses), in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

Original.name: InsuranceServiceResult
Original.description: The amount comprising insurance revenue and insurance service expenses, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance revenue, operating; Insurance service expenses from insurance contracts issued, operating; Income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held, other than finance income (expenses), operating]

Original.name: FeeAndCommissionIncome
Original.description: The amount of income relating to fees and commissions, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: FeeAndCommissionExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense relating to fees and commissions, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: FeeAndCommissionIncomeExpense
Original.description: The amount of income or expense relating to fees and commissions, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: RentalIncome
Original.description: The amount of income recognised from rental activities, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: RentalExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense recognised on rental activities, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: RentalIncomeExpenseOperating
Original.description: The amount of income or expense arising from rental activities, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Rental expense, operating; Rental income, operating]

Original.name: InvestmentIncomeOperating
Original.description: The amount of investment income, such as interest and dividends, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: InsuranceFinanceIncomeExpenses
Original.description: The amount that comprises the change in the carrying amount of the group of insurance contracts arising from: (a) the effect of the time value of money and changes in the time value of money; and (b) the effect of financial risk and changes in financial risk; but (c) excluding any such changes for groups of insurance contracts with direct participation features that would adjust the contractual service margin but do not do so when applying paragraphs 45(b)(ii), 45(b)(iii), 45(c)(ii) or 45(c)(iii) of IFRS 17, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: FinancialResultOperating
Original.description: The amount of investment income minus insurance finance income and expenses, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ProfitLoss
Original.description: The total of income less expenses from continuing and discontinued operations, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnRevaluation
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) in relation to changes in the revaluation surplus of property, plant and equipment, right-of-use assets and intangible assets. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Revaluation surplus]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans, which comprise actuarial gains and losses; the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset); and any change in the effect of the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Defined benefit plans [domain]; Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)] [Contrast: Decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from gain (loss) on remeasurement in other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOtherThanTranslationOfForeignOperations
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to exchange differences on translation of the financial statements of a parent company or a stand-alone entity to a different presentation currency. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangeInCreditRiskOfLiability
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to changes in the fair value of financial liabilities attributable to the changes in the credit risk of those liabilities. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnHedgingInstrumentsThatHedgeInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will not be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax.

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationNetOfTax
Original.description: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on exchange differences on the translation of financial statements of foreign operations, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to exchange differences when the financial statements of foreign operations are translated, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to exchange differences when financial statements of foreign operations are translated. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnRemeasuringAvailableforsaleFinancialAssetsNetOfTax
Original.description: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on remeasuring available-for-sale financial assets, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnAvailableforsaleFinancialAssetsNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to available-for-sale financial assets, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnCashFlowHedgesNetOfTax
Original.description: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on cash flow hedges, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnCashFlowHedgesNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to cash flow hedges, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForAmountsTransferredToInitialCarryingAmountOfHedgedItems
Original.description: The amounts removed from equity and included in the initial cost or other carrying amount of a non-financial asset (liability) whose acquisition or incurrence was a hedged, highly probable forecast transaction, net of tax. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxCashFlowHedges
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperationsNetOfTax
Original.description: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperationsNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptionsNetOfTax
Original.description: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on change in value of time value of options, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptionsNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to change in value of time value of options, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptions
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of time value of options. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContractsNetOfTax
Original.description: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on change in value of forward elements of forward contracts, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContractsNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContracts
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreadsNetOfTax
Original.description: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on change in value of foreign currency basis spreads, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreadsNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreads
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: GainsLossesOnFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax
Original.description: The gains (losses) recognised in other comprehensive income on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 4.1.2A of IFRS 9, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: AmountsRemovedFromEquityAndAdjustedAgainstFairValueOfFinancialAssetsOnReclassificationOutOfFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeMeasurementCategoryNetOfTax
Original.description: The amounts removed from equity and adjusted against the fair value of financial assets on reclassification out of the fair value through other comprehensive income measurement category, net of tax. [Refer: Financial assets]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 4.1.2A of IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: InsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that is excluded from profit or loss and recognised in other comprehensive income that will be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: FinanceIncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldExcludedFromProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held that is excluded from profit or loss and recognised in other comprehensive income, net of tax, before reclassification adjustments. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

Original.name: ReclassificationAdjustmentsOnFinanceIncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldExcludedFromProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of reclassification adjustments related to finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxFinanceIncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldExcludedFromProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

Original.name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax.

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that is not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by IFRS Accounting Standards. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent
Original.description: The amount of comprehensive income attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Comprehensive income]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The amount of comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Comprehensive income; Non-controlling interests]

Original.name: ProfitLoss
Original.description: The total of income less expenses from continuing and discontinued operations, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated as measured at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRevaluation
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) in relation to changes in the revaluation surplus of property, plant and equipment, right-of-use assets and intangible assets. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax; Revaluation surplus]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans, which comprise actuarial gains and losses; the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset); and any change in the effect of the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Defined benefit plans [domain]; Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)] [Contrast: Decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from gain (loss) on remeasurement in other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOtherThanTranslationOfForeignOperations
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to exchange differences on translation of the financial statements of a parent company or a stand-alone entity to a different presentation currency. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangeInCreditRiskOfLiability
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to change in the fair value of financial liability attributable to change in the credit risk of the liability. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax; Credit risk [member]]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnHedgingInstrumentsThatHedgeInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
