Original.name: CurrentDeferredIncomeIncludingCurrentContractLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current deferred income including current contract liabilities. [Refer: Deferred income including contract liabilities]

Original.name: AccrualsClassifiedAsCurrent
Original.description: The amount of accruals classified as current. [Refer: Accruals]

Original.name: ShorttermEmployeeBenefitsAccruals
Original.description: The amount of accruals for employee benefits (other than termination benefits) that are expected to be settled wholly within twelve months after the end of the annual reporting period in which the employees render the related services. [Refer: Accruals classified as current]

Original.name: CurrentAccrualsAndCurrentDeferredIncomeIncludingCurrentContractLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current accruals and current deferred income including current contract liabilities. [Refer: Accruals; Deferred income including contract liabilities]

Original.name: CurrentPayablesOnSocialSecurityAndTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
Original.description: The amount of current payables on social security and taxes other than incomes tax. [Refer: Payables on social security and taxes other than income tax]

Original.name: CurrentValueAddedTaxPayables
Original.description: The amount of current value added tax payables. [Refer: Value added tax payables]

Original.name: CurrentExciseTaxPayables
Original.description: The amount of current excise tax payables. [Refer: Excise tax payables]

Original.name: CurrentRetentionPayables
Original.description: The amount of current retention payables. [Refer: Retention payables]

Original.name: OtherCurrentPayables
Original.description: The amount of current payables that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

Original.name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayables
Original.description: The amount of current trade payables and current other payables. [Refer: Current trade payables; Other current payables]

Original.name: TradeAndOtherPayablesToTradeSuppliers
Original.description: The amount of payment due to suppliers for goods and services used in the entity's business.

Original.name: PayablesForPurchaseOfEnergy
Original.description: The amount of payables for the purchase of energy.

Original.name: TradeAndOtherPayablesToRelatedParties
Original.description: The amount of payables due to related parties. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: PayablesForPurchaseOfNoncurrentAssets
Original.description: The amount of payables for the purchase of non-current assets. [Refer: Non-current assets]

Original.name: Advances
Original.description: The amount of advances received representing contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at a point in time. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Performance obligations satisfied at point in time [member]]

Original.name: ContractLiabilitiesForPerformanceObligationsSatisfiedOverTime
Original.description: The amount of contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied over time. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Performance obligations satisfied over time [member]]

Original.name: ContractLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of an entity’s obligation to transfer goods or services to a customer for which the entity has received consideration (or the amount is due) from the customer.

Original.name: DeferredIncomeOtherThanContractLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities representing income that has been received (or the amount is due) but is not yet earned, other than contract liabilities. [Refer: Contract liabilities]

Original.name: RentDeferredIncome
Original.description: The amount of deferred income arising on rental activity. [Refer: Deferred income other than contract liabilities]

Original.name: GovernmentGrants
Original.description: The amount of assistance by government in the form of transfers of resources to an entity in return for past or future compliance with certain conditions relating to the operating activities of the entity, recognised as deferred income. They exclude those forms of government assistance that cannot reasonably have a value placed upon them and transactions with government that cannot be distinguished from the normal trading transactions of the entity. [Refer: Deferred income other than contract liabilities; Government [member]]

Original.name: DeferredIncomeIncludingContractLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities representing income that has been received (or the amount is due) but is not yet earned, including contract liabilities. [Refer: Contract liabilities]

Original.name: Accruals
Original.description: The amount of liabilities to pay for goods or services that have been received or supplied but have not been paid, invoiced or formally agreed with the supplier, including amounts due to employees.

Original.name: AccrualsAndDeferredIncomeIncludingContractLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of accruals and deferred income, including contract liabilities. [Refer: Accruals; Deferred income including contract liabilities]

Original.name: PayablesOnSocialSecurityAndTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
Original.description: The amount of payment due on social security and taxes other than income tax. Income taxes include all domestic and foreign taxes that are based on taxable profits. Income taxes also include taxes, such as withholding taxes, that are payable by a subsidiary, associate or joint arrangement on distributions to the reporting entity.

Original.name: ValueAddedTaxPayables
Original.description: The amount of payables related to a value added tax.

Original.name: ExciseTaxPayables
Original.description: The amount of payables related to excise tax.

Original.name: RetentionPayables
Original.description: The amount of payment that is withheld by the entity, pending the fulfilment of a condition.

Original.name: OtherPayables
Original.description: Amounts payable that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

Original.name: TradeAndOtherPayables
Original.description: The amount of trade payables and other payables. [Refer: Trade payables; Other payables]

Original.name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
Original.description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. [Refer: Non-current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognition
Original.description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

Original.name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

Original.name: NoncurrentFinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of non-current financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

Original.name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
Original.description: The amount of current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. [Refer: Current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognition
Original.description: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

Original.name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

Original.name: CurrentFinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

Original.name: FinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
Original.description: The amount of financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. A financial liability is classified as held for trading if: (a) it is acquired or incurred principally for the purpose of selling or repurchasing it in the near term; (b) on initial recognition it is part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking; or (c) it is a derivative (except for a derivative that is a financial guarantee contract or a designated and effective hedging instrument). [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: DepositsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossThatMeetDefinitionOfHeldForTrading
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities held by the entity at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading]

Original.name: DepositsFromBanksAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossThatMeetDefinitionOfHeldForTrading
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities from banks held by the entity at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading]

Original.name: DepositsFromCustomersAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossThatMeetDefinitionOfHeldForTrading
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities from customers held by the entity at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading]

Original.name: FinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedAsUponInitialRecognition
Original.description: The amount of financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: DepositsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognitionOrSubsequently
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities held by the entity at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

Original.name: DepositsFromBanksAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognitionOrSubsequently
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities from banks held by the entity at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

Original.name: DepositsFromCustomersAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognitionOrSubsequently
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities from customers held by the entity at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

Original.name: DebtInstrumentsIssuedAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognitionOrSubsequently
Original.description: The amount of instruments issued by the entity that represent indebtedness at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

Original.name: FinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of financial liabilities that meet either of the following conditions: (a) they meet the definition of held for trading; or (b) upon initial recognition they are designated by the entity as at fair value through profit or loss. An entity may use this designation only when permitted by paragraph 4.3.5 of IFRS 9 (embedded derivatives) or when doing so results in more relevant information, because either: (a) it eliminates or significantly reduces a measurement or recognition inconsistency (sometimes referred to as ‘an accounting mismatch’) that would otherwise arise from measuring assets or liabilities or recognising the gains and losses on them on different bases; or (b) a group of financial liabilities or financial assets and financial liabilities is managed and its performance is evaluated on a fair value basis, in accordance with a documented risk management or investment strategy, and information about the group is provided internally on that basis to the entity’s key management personnel (as defined in IAS 24). [Refer: At fair value [member]; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]; Derivatives [member]; Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

Original.name: FinancialLiabilitiesAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: The amount of financial liabilities at amortised cost. The amortised cost is the amount at which financial liabilities are measured at initial recognition minus principal repayments, plus or minus the cumulative amortisation using the effective interest method of any difference between that initial amount and the maturity amount. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

Original.name: DepositsAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities held by the entity at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

Original.name: DepositsFromBanksAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities from banks held by the entity at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

Original.name: DepositsFromCustomersAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities from customers held by the entity at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

Original.name: DebtInstrumentsIssuedAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: The amount of instruments issued by the entity that represent indebtedness at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

Original.name: SubordinatedLiabilitiesAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that are subordinate to other liabilities with respect to claims at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

Original.name: FinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that are: (a) a contractual obligation: (i) to deliver cash or another financial asset to another entity; or (ii) to exchange financial assets or financial liabilities with another entity under conditions that are potentially unfavourable to the entity; or (b) a contract that will, or may be, settled in the entity’s own equity instruments and is: (i) a non-derivative for which the entity is, or may be, obliged to deliver a variable number of the entity’s own equity instruments; or (ii) a derivative that will, or may be, settled other than by the exchange of a fixed amount of cash or another financial asset for a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments. For this purpose, rights, options or warrants to acquire a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments for a fixed amount of any currency are equity instruments if the entity offers the rights, options or warrants pro rata to all of its existing owners of the same class of its own non-derivative equity instruments. Also, for those purposes the entity’s own equity instruments do not include puttable financial instruments that are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16A-16B of IAS 32, instruments that impose on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation and are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32, or instruments that are contracts for the future receipt or delivery of the entity’s own equity instruments. As an exception, an instrument that meets the definition of a financial liability is classified as an equity instrument if it has all the features and meets the conditions in paragraphs 16A-16B or paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32. [Refer: Classes of financial instruments [domain]; Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

Original.name: NoncurrentRecognisedLiabilitiesDefinedBenefitPlan
Original.description: The amount of non-current net defined benefit liability. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability]

Original.name: NoncurrentDerivativeFinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of non-current derivative financial liabilities. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities]

Original.name: NoncurrentDividendPayables
Original.description: The amount of non-current dividend payables. [Refer: Dividend payables]

Original.name: NoncurrentInterestPayable
Original.description: The amount of non-current interest payable. [Refer: Interest payable]

Original.name: NoncurrentDepositsFromCustomers
Original.description: The amount of non-current deposits from customers. [Refer: Deposits from customers]

Original.name: NoncurrentDebtInstrumentsIssued
Original.description: The amount of non-current debt instruments issued. [Refer: Debt instruments issued]

Original.name: NoncurrentWarrantLiability
Original.description: The amount of non-current warrant liabilities. [Refer: Warrant liability]

Original.name: OtherNoncurrentLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of non-current liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Non-current liabilities]

Original.name: CurrentRecognisedLiabilitiesDefinedBenefitPlan
Original.description: The amount of current net defined benefit liability. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability]

Original.name: CurrentDerivativeFinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current derivative financial liabilities. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities]

Original.name: CurrentDividendPayables
Original.description: The amount of current dividend payables. [Refer: Dividend payables]

Original.name: CurrentInterestPayable
Original.description: The amount of current interest payable. [Refer: Interest payable]

Original.name: CurrentDepositsFromCustomers
Original.description: The amount of current deposits from customers. [Refer: Deposits from customers]

Original.name: CurrentDebtInstrumentsIssued
Original.description: The amount of current debt instruments issued. [Refer: Debt instruments issued]

Original.name: CurrentAccruedExpensesAndOtherCurrentLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current accrued expenses and other current liabilities. [Refer: Accruals; Other current liabilities]

Original.name: CurrentWarrantLiability
Original.description: The amount of current warrant liabilities. [Refer: Warrant liability]

Original.name: OtherCurrentLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Current liabilities]

Original.name: RecognisedLiabilitiesDefinedBenefitPlan
Original.description: The amount of deficit in a defined benefit plan. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [domain]]

Original.name: DerivativeFinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of financial liabilities classified as derivative instruments. [Refer: Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

Original.name: DerivativeFinancialLiabilitiesHeldForTrading
Original.description: The amount of derivative financial liabilities held for trading. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading]

Original.name: DerivativeFinancialLiabilitiesHeldForHedging
Original.description: The amount of derivative financial liabilities held for hedging. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities]

Original.name: DividendPayables
Original.description: The amount of dividends that the company has declared but not yet paid.

Original.name: InterestPayable
Original.description: The amount of interest recognised as a liability.

Original.name: DepositLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities held by the entity.

Original.name: DepositsFromBanks
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities from banks held by the entity.

Original.name: BalancesOnTermDepositsFromCustomers
Original.description: The amount of balances in customers' term deposits held by the entity.

Original.name: BalancesOnDemandDepositsFromCustomers
Original.description: The amount of balances in customers' demand deposits held by the entity.

Original.name: BalancesOnCurrentAccountsFromCustomers
Original.description: The amount of balances in customers' current accounts held by the entity.

Original.name: BalancesOnOtherDepositsFromCustomers
Original.description: The amount of balances in customers' deposit accounts held by the entity that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

Original.name: DepositsFromCustomers
Original.description: The amount of deposit liabilities from customers held by the entity.

Original.name: LiabilitiesDueToCentralBanks
Original.description: The amount of liabilities due to central banks.

Original.name: DatedSubordinatedLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of subordinated liabilities that have a specified repayment date. [Refer: Subordinated liabilities]

Original.name: UndatedSubordinatedLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of subordinated liabilities that do not have a specified repayment date. [Refer: Subordinated liabilities]

Original.name: SubordinatedLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that are subordinate to other liabilities with respect to claims.

Original.name: DebtSecurities
Original.description: The amount of instruments issued by the entity that represent indebtedness.

Original.name: BankAcceptanceLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of bank acceptances recognised as liabilities.

Original.name: RepurchaseAgreementsAndCashCollateralOnSecuritiesLent
Original.description: The amount of instruments sold with the intent to reacquire in repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities lent.

Original.name: InvestmentContractsLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities relating to investment contracts that fall within the scope of IAS 39 or IFRS 9.

Original.name: ItemsInCourseOfTransmissionToOtherBanks
Original.description: The amount of items that have been transmitted to but not yet received and processed by other banks.

Original.name: WarrantLiability
Original.description: The amount of warrant liabilities.

Original.name: OtherLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

Original.name: IssuedCapitalOrdinaryShares
Original.description: The nominal value of capital arising from issuing ordinary shares. [Refer: Issued capital]

Original.name: IssuedCapitalPreferenceShares
Original.description: The nominal value of capital arising from issuing preference shares. [Refer: Issued capital]

Original.name: IssuedCapital
Original.description: The nominal value of capital issued.

Original.name: RetainedEarningsProfitLossForReportingPeriod
Original.description: A component of equity representing the entity’s undistributed profit or loss for the reporting period. [Refer: Retained earnings; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: RetainedEarningsExcludingProfitLossForReportingPeriod
Original.description: A component of equity representing the entity’s cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit excluding the profit or loss for the reporting period. [Refer: Retained earnings]

Original.name: RetainedEarnings
Original.description: A component of equity representing the entity's cumulative undistributed earnings or deficit.

Original.name: RevaluationSurplus
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated revaluation surplus on the revaluation of assets recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
Original.description: A component of equity representing exchange differences on translation of financial statements recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReserveOfCashFlowHedges
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated portion of gain (loss) on a hedging instrument that is determined to be an effective hedge for cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]]

Original.name: ReserveOfGainsAndLossesOnHedgingInstrumentsThatHedgeInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated gains and losses on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income.

Original.name: ReserveOfChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptions
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the time value of options when separating the intrinsic value and time value of an option contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the intrinsic value.

Original.name: ReserveOfChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContracts
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of the forward elements of forward contracts when separating the forward element and spot element of a forward contract and designating as the hedging instrument only the changes in the spot element.

Original.name: ReserveOfChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreads
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in the value of foreign currency basis spreads of financial instruments when excluding them from the designation of these financial instruments as hedging instruments.

Original.name: ReserveOfGainsAndLossesOnFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: A component of equity representing the reserve of gains and losses on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReserveOfInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued excluded from profit or loss that will be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: ReserveOfInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued excluded from profit or loss that will not be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Insurance contracts issued [member]]

Original.name: ReserveOfFinanceIncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldExcludedFromProfitOrLoss
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held excluded from profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses), operating; Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

Original.name: ReserveOfRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated remeasurements of defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [domain]]

Original.name: AmountRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeAndAccumulatedInEquityRelatingToNoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsHeldForSale
Original.description: The amount recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in equity, relating to non-current assets or disposal groups held for sale. [Refer: Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Other reserves; Other comprehensive income; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

Original.name: ReserveOfGainsAndLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
Original.description: A component of equity representing accumulated gains and losses from investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated as measured at fair value through other comprehensive income.

Original.name: ReserveOfChangeInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangeInCreditRiskOfLiability
Original.description: A component of equity representing the accumulated change in fair value of financial liabilities attributable to change in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

Original.name: AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of accumulated items of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that are not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by other IFRS Accounting Standards. [Refer: IFRSs [member]; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ReserveOfSharebasedPayments
Original.description: A component of equity resulting from share-based payments.

Original.name: ReserveOfEquityComponentOfConvertibleInstruments
Original.description: A component of equity representing components of convertible instruments classified as equity.

Original.name: CapitalRedemptionReserve
Original.description: A component of equity representing the reserve for the redemption of the entity's own shares.

Original.name: MergerReserve
Original.description: A component of equity that may result in relation to a business combination outside the scope of IFRS 3.

Original.name: StatutoryReserve
Original.description: A component of equity representing reserves created based on legal requirements.

Original.name: CapitalReserve
Original.description: A component of equity representing the capital reserves.

Original.name: AdditionalPaidinCapital
Original.description: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders.

Original.name: WarrantReserve
Original.description: A component of equity resulting from issuing share purchase warrants, other than those resulting from share-based payment arrangements. [Refer: Reserve of share-based payments]

Original.name: Assets
Original.description: The amount of a present economic resource controlled by the entity as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

Original.name: Liabilities
Original.description: The amount of a present obligation of the entity to transfer an economic resource as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

Original.name: NetAssetsLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of assets less the amount of liabilities.

Original.name: CurrentAssets
Original.description: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

Original.name: CurrentLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have the right at the end of the reporting period to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

Original.name: CurrentAssetsLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of current assets less the amount of current liabilities.

Original.name: Assets
Original.description: The amount of a present economic resource controlled by the entity as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

Original.name: CurrentLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have the right at the end of the reporting period to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

Original.name: AssetsLessCurrentLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of assets less the amount of current liabilities.

Original.name: NetDebt
Original.description: The amount of net debt of the entity.

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfGoods
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of goods, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfCopper
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of copper, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfGold
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of gold, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfSilver
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of silver, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfOilAndGasProducts
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of oil and gas products, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfCrudeOil
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of crude oil, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Current crude oil; Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfNaturalGas
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of natural gas, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Current natural gas; Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfPetroleumAndPetrochemicalProducts
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of petroleum and petrochemical products, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Current petroleum and petrochemical products; Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfTelecommunicationEquipment
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of telecommunication equipment, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfElectricity

Such programmes include: (a) the sale or termination of a line of business; (b) closure of business locations in a country or region or the relocation of activities from one country or region to another; (c) changes in management structure; and (d) fundamental reorganisations that have a material effect on the nature and focus of the entity's operations.

Original.name: ServicesExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from services, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: InsuranceExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from purchased insurance, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ProfessionalFeesExpense
Original.description: The amount of fees paid or payable for professional services, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: TransportationExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from transportation services, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: BankAndSimilarCharges
Original.description: The amount of bank and similar charges recognised by the entity as an expense, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: EnergyTransmissionCharges
Original.description: The amount of charges related to transmission of energy, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: TravelExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from travel, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: CommunicationExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from communication, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: UtilitiesExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from purchased utilities, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: AdvertisingExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from advertising, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: TaxExpenseOtherThanIncomeTaxExpense
Original.description: The amount of tax expense exclusive of income tax expense, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: PropertyTaxExpense
Original.description: The amount of tax expense levied on property, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

Original.name: ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates accounted for using the equity method, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ShareOfProfitLossOfJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, in the investing category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseInAccumulatedDeferredTaxRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeDueToChangeInTaxRate
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in accumulated deferred tax recognised in other comprehensive income due to change in the tax rate. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to exchange differences when financial statements of foreign operations are translated. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOfForeignOperationsAndHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, that is the aggregate of exchange differences on translation of financial statements of foreign operations and hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to exchange differences on translation of financial statements of foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOfForeignOperationsAndHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, that is the aggregate of exchange differences on translation of financial statements of foreign operations and hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOfOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to amounts recognised in other comprehensive income in relation to exchange differences on the translation of financial statements of foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Reserve of exchange differences on translation]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperationsOfOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to amounts recognised in other comprehensive income in relation to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOfForeignOperationsAndHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperationsIncludedInOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to amounts recognised in other comprehensive income in relation to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Hedges of net investment in foreign operations [member]]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income attributable to owners of the parent.

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: The amount of individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: OtherComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
Original.description: The amount of individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

Original.name: OtherComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
Original.description: The amount of individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToOtherComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to other individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToOtherComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to other individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax.

Original.name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
Original.description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax.

Original.name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, net of tax. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
Original.description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax.

Original.name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
Original.description: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax.

Original.name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodBeforeTax
Original.description: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, before tax. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to an entity's share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, before tax]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to an entity's share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, before tax]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to an entity's share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, before tax]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to amounts recognised in other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to amounts recognised in other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Income tax relating to components of other comprehensive income]

Original.name: IncomeTaxRelatingToComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of income tax relating to amounts recognised in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromContinuingOperations
Original.description: The comprehensive income from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations, unless line item indicates otherwise [member]; Comprehensive income]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromDiscontinuedOperations
Original.description: The comprehensive income from discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Comprehensive income]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToOwnersOfParent
Original.description: The comprehensive income from continuing operations attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Comprehensive income from continuing operations]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToOwnersOfParent
Original.description: The comprehensive income from discontinued operations attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Comprehensive income from discontinued operations]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent
Original.description: The amount of comprehensive income attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Comprehensive income]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The comprehensive income from continuing operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Comprehensive income from continuing operations; Non-controlling interests]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The comprehensive income from discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Comprehensive income from discontinued operations; Non-controlling interests]

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The amount of comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Comprehensive income; Non-controlling interests]

Original.name: CostOfSales
Original.description: The amount of all expenses directly or indirectly attributed to the goods or services sold, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Attributed expenses include, but are not limited to, costs previously included in the measurement of inventory that has now been sold, such as depreciation and maintenance of factory buildings and equipment used in the production process, unallocated production overheads, and abnormal amounts of production costs of inventories.

Original.name: ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense
Original.description: The amount of expenditure directly attributable to research or development activities, recognised in profit or loss, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense relating to general and administrative activities of the entity, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: SellingExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense relating to selling activities of the entity, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossGoodwill
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for goodwill, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Goodwill]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossOperating
Original.description: The total of all income and expenses classified in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: Depreciation
Original.description: The amount of depreciation, comprising that required to be disclosed by paragraph 73(e)(vii) of IAS 16 Property, Plant and Equipment, paragraph 79(d)(iv) of IAS 40 Investment Property and paragraph 53(a) of IFRS 16 Leases.

Original.name: Amortisation
Original.description: The amount of amortisation, comprising the amount required to be disclosed by paragraph 118(e)(vi) of IAS 38 Intangible Assets.

Original.name: EmployeeBenefitsExpense
Original.description: The expense of all forms of consideration given by an entity in exchange for a service rendered by employees or for the termination of employment, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss or reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss]

Original.name: WritedownsReversalsOfInventories
Original.description: The amount recognised resulting from the write-down of inventories to net realisable value or reversal of those write-down, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Inventories]

Original.name: GrossProfit
Original.description: The amount of revenue less cost of sales, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Cost of sales, operating; Revenue, operating]

Original.name: InterestRevenueExpense
Original.description: The amount of income and expense arising from interest, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Interest expense, operating; Interest revenue calculated using effective interest method, operating]

Original.name: FeeAndCommissionIncomeExpense
Original.description: The amount of income or expense relating to fees and commissions, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: InsuranceServiceResult
Original.description: The amount comprising insurance revenue and insurance service expenses, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance revenue, operating; Insurance service expenses from insurance contracts issued, operating; Income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held, other than finance income (expenses), operating]

Original.name: FinancialResultOperating
Original.description: The amount of investment income minus insurance finance income and expenses, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: RentalIncomeExpenseOperating
Original.description: The amount of income or expense arising from rental activities, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Rental expense, operating; Rental income, operating]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossBeforeDepreciationAmortisationAndImpairmentsOperating
Original.description: The operating profit or loss before depreciation, amortisation and impairments within the scope of IAS 36 Impairment of Assets. [Refer: Operating profit (loss), operating]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossOperating
Original.description: The total of all income and expenses classified in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossAndIncomeExpensesFromAllInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
Original.description: The operating profit or loss and income and expenses from all investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Operating profit (loss), operating]

Original.name: OperatingProfitLossAndAllIncomeExpensesClassifiedInInvestingCategory
Original.description: The operating profit or loss and all income and expenses classified in the investing category.

Original.name: ProfitLossBeforeFinancingAndIncomeTaxes
Original.description: The profit (loss) before financing and income tax expense or income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ProfitLossBeforeTax
Original.description: The profit (loss) before income tax expense or income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperations
Original.description: The profit (loss) from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations, unless line item indicates otherwise [member]; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: ProfitLoss
Original.description: The total of income less expenses from continuing and discontinued operations, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: Revenue
Original.description: The income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. Income is increases in assets, or decreases in liabilities, that result in increases in equity, other than those relating to contributions from holders of equity claims.

Original.name: OtherOperatingIncomeExpense
Original.description: The amount of operating income (expense) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense
Original.description: The amount of expenditure directly attributable to research or development activities, recognised in profit or loss, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
Original.description: The amount of expense relating to general and administrative activities of the entity, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossGoodwill
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for goodwill, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Goodwill]

Original.name: IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations
Original.description: The aggregate amount included in the determination of profit (loss) for the period in respect of current tax and deferred tax, in the income taxes category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Current tax expense (income), income taxes; Deferred tax expense (income)]

Original.name: ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
Original.description: The profit (loss) from continuing and discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss); Non-controlling interests]

Original.name: PaymentsToSuppliersForGoodsAndServicesAndToAndOnBehalfOfEmployees
Original.description: The cash outflow for payments to suppliers for goods and services and to, and on behalf of, employees.

Original.name: PaymentsForExplorationAndEvaluationExpenses
Original.description: The cash outflow for expenses incurred by an entity in connection with the exploration for, and evaluation of, mineral resources before the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting a mineral resource are demonstrable.

Original.name: AdjustmentsForInterestExpense
Original.description: Adjustments for interest expense to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Interest expense; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForInterestIncome
Original.description: Adjustments for interest income expense to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Interest income; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDividendIncome
Original.description: Adjustments for dividend income to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Dividend income, operating; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLossOtherThanChangesInWorkingCapital
Original.description: Adjustments, other than changes in working capital, to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital
Original.description: The cash inflow (outflow) from the entity's operations before changes in working capital.

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseInWorkingCapital
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in working capital.

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAndOtherReceivables
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in trade and other receivables to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Trade and other receivables; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAndOtherPayables
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in trade and other payables to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Trade and other payables; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInPrepaidExpenses
Original.description: Adjustments for the decrease (increase) in prepaid expenses to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Current prepaid expenses; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInContractAssets
Original.description: Adjustments for the decrease (increase) in contract assets to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Contract assets; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInAccruedIncomeOtherThanContractAssets
Original.description: Adjustments for the decrease (increase) in accrued income other than contract assets to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Accrued income other than contract assets; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInAccruedIncomeIncludingContractAssets
Original.description: Adjustments for the decrease (increase) in accrued income including contract assets to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Accrued income including contract assets; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInContractLiabilities
Original.description: Adjustments for the increase (decrease) in contract liabilities to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeOtherThanContractLiabilities
Original.description: Adjustments for the increase (decrease) in deferred income other than contract liabilities to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Deferred income other than contract liabilities; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeIncludingContractLiabilities
Original.description: Adjustments for the increase (decrease) in deferred income including contract liabilities to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Deferred income including contract liabilities; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInOtherAssets
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other assets to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Other assets; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInOtherLiabilities
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in other liabilities to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Other liabilities; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInOtherCurrentAssets
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Other current assets; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentLiabilities
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in other current liabilities to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Other current liabilities; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInEmployeeBenefitLiabilities
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in employee benefit liabilities to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInInsuranceReinsuranceAndInvestmentContractLiabilities
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in insurance, reinsurance and investment contract liabilities to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Investment contracts liabilities; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInRepurchaseAgreementsAndCashCollateralOnSecuritiesLent
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities lent to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities lent; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInReverseRepurchaseAgreementsAndCashCollateralOnSecuritiesBorrowed
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in reverse repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities borrowed to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Reverse repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities borrowed; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in financial assets measured at amortised cost to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial assets at amortised cost; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognitionOrSubsequently
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in financial assets at fair value through profit or loss that were designated upon initial recognition or subsequently to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMandatorilyMeasuredAtFairValue
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in financial assets at fair value through profit or loss that are mandatorily measured at fair value to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, mandatorily measured at fair value; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInFinancialAssetsHeldForTrading
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in financial assets held for trading to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInFinancialLiabilitiesMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in financial liabilities measured at amortised cost to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial liabilities; Financial liabilities at amortised cost; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInFinancialLiabilitiesMeasuredAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial liabilities; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognitionOrSubsequently
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss that were designated upon initial recognition or subsequently to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial liabilities; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInFinancialLiabilitiesHeldForTrading
Original.description: Adjustments for increase (decrease) in financial liabilities held for trading to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Financial liabilities; Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet definition of held for trading; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInLoansAndAdvances
Original.description: Adjustments for decrease (increase) in loans and advances to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. [Refer: Loans and advances; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInLoansAndAdvancesToBanks
