Original.name: GainsLossesOnNetMonetaryPosition
Original.description: The gains (losses) representing the difference resulting from the restatement of non-monetary assets, owners' equity and items in the statement of comprehensive income and the adjustment of index linked assets and liabilities in hyperinflationary reporting.

Original.name: CashTransferred
Original.description: The fair value, at acquisition date, of cash transferred as consideration in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: OtherTangibleOrIntangibleAssetsTransferred
Original.description: The fair value, at acquisition date, of other tangible or intangible assets (including a business or subsidiary of the acquirer) transferred as consideration in a business combination, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same note. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Total for all business combinations [member]; Total for all subsidiaries [member]]

Original.name: LiabilitiesIncurred
Original.description: The fair value, at acquisition date, of liabilities incurred (for example, a liability for contingent consideration) as consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: EquityInterestsOfAcquirer
Original.description: The fair value, at the acquisition date, of equity interests of the acquirer transferred as consideration in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: AcquisitiondateFairValueOfTotalConsiderationTransferred
Original.description: The fair value, at acquisition date, of the consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: ContingentConsiderationRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount, at acquisition date, of contingent consideration arrangements recognised as consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IndemnificationAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for indemnification assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: FinancialAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for financial assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Financial assets; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: InventoryRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for inventory acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Inventories; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for plant, property and equipment acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IdentifiableIntangibleAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for identifiable intangible assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: CustomerrelatedIntangibleAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for customer-related intangible assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Customer-related intangible assets [member]; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: TechnologybasedIntangibleAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for technology-based intangible assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Technology-based intangible assets [member]; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: FinancialLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for financial liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Financial liabilities; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: ContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised as of the acquisition date in a business combination. [Refer: Classes of contingent liabilities [domain]; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IdentifiableAssetsAcquiredLiabilitiesAssumed
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for net identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: NoncurrentAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for non-current assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Non-current assets; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: CurrentAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for current assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Current assets; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: NoncurrentLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for non-current liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Non-current liabilities; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: CurrentLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for current liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Current liabilities; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: TradeAndOtherPayablesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for trade and other payables assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Trade and other payables; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: DeferredTaxAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for deferred tax assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: DeferredTaxLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for deferred tax liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: BorrowingsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for borrowings assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Borrowings; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: ContractLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for contract liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: DeferredIncomeOtherThanContractLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for deferred income other than contract liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Deferred income other than contract liabilities; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: DeferredIncomeIncludingContractLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for deferred income including contract liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Deferred income including contract liabilities; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: CashAndCashEquivalentsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for cash and cash equivalents acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: GoodwillRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount recognised as of the business combination's acquisition date for goodwill. [Refer: Goodwill; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: GoodwillExpectedDeductibleForTaxPurposes
Original.description: The amount of goodwill in a business combination that is expected to be deductible for tax purposes. [Refer: Goodwill; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: GainRecognisedInBargainPurchaseTransaction
Original.description: The amount of any gain recognised in a business combination in which the net of the identifiable assets acquired and the liabilities assumed exceeds the aggregate of the consideration transferred, non-controlling interest in the acquiree and fair value of the acquirer's previously held equity interest in the acquiree, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: NoncontrollingInterestInAcquireeRecognisedAtAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The amount of non-controlling interest in the acquiree recognised at the acquisition date for business combinations in which the acquirer holds less than 100 per cent of the equity interests in the acquiree at the acquisition date. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: AcquisitiondateFairValueOfEquityInterestInAcquireeHeldByAcquirerImmediatelyBeforeAcquisitionDate
Original.description: The acquisition-date fair value of equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date in a business combination achieved in stages. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: GainLossRecognisedAsResultOfRemeasuringToFairValueEquityInterestInAcquireeHeldByAcquirerBeforeBusinessCombination
Original.description: The gain (loss) recognised as result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer before the business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: RevenueOfAcquiree
Original.description: The amount of revenue of the acquiree since the acquisition date included in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating]

Original.name: ProfitLossOfAcquiree
Original.description: The profit (loss) of the acquiree, since the acquisition date, included in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

Original.name: RevenueOfCombinedEntity
Original.description: The revenue of the combined entity as though the acquisition date for all business combinations that occurred during the year had been as of the beginning of the annual reporting period. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]; Revenue, operating]

Original.name: ProfitLossOfCombinedEntity
Original.description: The profit (loss) of the combined entity as though the acquisition date for all business combinations that occurred during the year had been as of the beginning of the annual reporting period. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]; Profit (loss)]

Original.name: MeasurementPeriodAdjustmentsRecognisedForParticularAssetsLiabilitiesNoncontrollingInterestsOrItemsOfConsideration
Original.description: The amount of measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration if the initial accounting for a business combination is incomplete. The measurement period is the period after the acquisition date during which the acquirer may adjust the provisional amounts recognised for a business combination. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseInContingentConsiderationAssetLiability
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in a contingent consideration asset (liability) relating to a business combination.

Original.name: GainLossThatRelatesToIdentifiableAssetsAcquiredOrLiabilitiesAssumedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The gain (loss) that both: (a) relates to identifiable assets acquired or liabilities assumed in a business combination; and (b) is of such size, nature or incidence that disclosure is relevant to understanding the combined entity's financial statements, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: Goodwill
Original.description: The amount of assets representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognised. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: AdditionalRecognitionGoodwill
Original.description: The amount of additional goodwill recognised, except goodwill included in a disposal group that, on acquisition, meets the criteria to be classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5. [Refer: Goodwill; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

Original.name: SubsequentRecognitionOfDeferredTaxAssetsGoodwill
Original.description: The decrease in goodwill resulting from the subsequent recognition of deferred tax assets during the measurement period for a business combination. [Refer: Goodwill; Deferred tax assets; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSaleGoodwill
Original.description: The decrease in goodwill due to classification as held for sale. [Refer: Goodwill; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

Original.name: GoodwillDerecognisedWithoutHavingPreviouslyBeenIncludedInDisposalGroupClassifiedAsHeldForSale
Original.description: The amount of goodwill derecognised without having previously been included in a disposal group classified as held for sale. [Refer: Goodwill; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossGoodwill
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for goodwill, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Goodwill]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesGoodwill
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in goodwill resulting from net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Goodwill]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesGoodwill
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in goodwill resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Goodwill]

Original.name: ChangesInGoodwill
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in goodwill. [Refer: Goodwill]

Original.name: Goodwill
Original.description: The amount of assets representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognised. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: AmountsRecognisedForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amounts recognised for transaction recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and the assumption of liabilities in business combinations. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: AcquisitionrelatedCostsForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of acquisition-related costs for transactions recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and the assumption of liabilities in business combinations, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: AcquisitionrelatedCostsRecognisedAsExpenseForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of acquisition-related costs recognised as an expense for transactions that are recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and the assumption of liabilities in business combinations, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IssueCostsNotRecognisedAsExpenseForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of issue costs not recognised as an expense for transactions recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: FairValueOfAcquiredReceivables
Original.description: The fair value of receivables acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: GrossContractualAmountsReceivableForAcquiredReceivables
Original.description: The gross contractual amounts receivable for receivables acquired in business combinations. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: BestEstimateAtAcquisitionDateOfContractualCashFlowsNotExpectedToBeCollectedForAcquiredReceivables
Original.description: The best estimate at acquisition date of contractual cash flows not expected to be collected for receivables acquired in business combinations. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: ExpectedReimbursementContingentLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount expected to be reimbursed by another party on expenditures to settle contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Classes of contingent liabilities [domain]; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: AssetRecognisedForExpectedReimbursementContingentLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of assets that have been recognised for the expected reimbursement of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Classes of contingent liabilities [domain]; Expected reimbursement, contingent liabilities in business combination; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: EstimatedFinancialEffectContingentLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of the estimated financial effect of contingent liabilities in a business combination that were not recognised because their fair value cannot be measured reliably. [Refer: Classes of contingent liabilities [domain]]

Original.name: ContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Classes of contingent liabilities [domain]; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: NewLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount recognised for new contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseInExistingLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The increase in existing contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: AdditionalLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of additional contingent liabilities recognised in business combinations. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Total for all business combinations [member]; Classes of contingent liabilities [domain]]

Original.name: SettledLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination that were settled. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination]

Original.name: ReversedUnsettledLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination that were unsettled and subsequently reversed. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IncreaseThroughAdjustmentsArisingFromPassageOfTimeContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The increase in contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination through adjustments arising from the passage of time. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughChangeInDiscountRateContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination due to changes in the discount rate. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseInContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination; Total for all business combinations [member]; Classes of contingent liabilities [domain]]

Original.name: ContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
Original.description: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Classes of contingent liabilities [domain]; Total for all business combinations [member]]

Original.name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationShorttermEmployeeBenefits
Original.description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of short-term employee benefits, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

Original.name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationPostemploymentBenefits
Original.description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of post-employment benefits, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

Original.name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationOtherLongtermBenefits
Original.description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of other long-term employee benefits, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Other long-term employee benefits, operating; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

Original.name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationTerminationBenefits
Original.description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of termination benefits, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Termination benefits expense, operating; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

Original.name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationSharebasedPayment
Original.description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of share-based payments, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

Original.name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensation
Original.description: The amount of compensation to key management personnel, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

Original.name: PurchasesOfGoodsRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of goods purchased by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: RevenueFromSaleOfGoodsRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the sale of goods in related party transactions, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating; Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: PurchasesOfPropertyAndOtherAssetsRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of property and other assets purchased by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: SalesOfPropertyAndOtherAssetsRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of property and other assets sold by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: ServicesReceivedRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of services received in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: RevenueFromRenderingOfServicesRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of revenue arising from the rendering of services in related party transactions, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Revenue, operating; Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: LeasesAsLessorRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of leases where the entity was the lessor in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: LeasesAsLesseeRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of leases where the entity was the lessee in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: TransfersOfResearchAndDevelopmentFromEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of transfers of research and development from the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: TransfersOfResearchAndDevelopmentToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of transfers of research and development to the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: TransfersUnderLicenseAgreementsFromEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of transfers under licence agreements from the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: TransfersUnderLicenseAgreementsToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of transfers under licence agreements to the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: TransfersUnderFinanceAgreementsFromEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of transfers under finance agreements from the entity in related party transactions, including loans and equity contributions in cash or in kind. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: TransfersUnderFinanceAgreementsToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of transfers under finance agreements to the entity in related party transactions, including loans and equity contributions in cash or in kind. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: ProvisionOfGuaranteesOrCollateralByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of guarantees or collateral provided by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Guarantees [member]; Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: ProvisionOfGuaranteesOrCollateralToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of guarantees or collateral provided to the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Guarantees [member]; Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: CommitmentsMadeByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of related-party commitments made by the entity to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised). [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: CommitmentsMadeOnBehalfOfEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of related-party commitments made on behalf of the entity to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised). [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: SettlementOfLiabilitiesByEntityOnBehalfOfRelatedPartyRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of liabilities settled by the entity on behalf of a related party in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: SettlementOfLiabilitiesOnBehalfOfEntityByRelatedPartyRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of liabilities settled on behalf of the entity by a related party in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: ParticipationInDefinedBenefitPlanThatSharesRisksBetweenGroupEntitiesRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of participation by the entity in a defined benefit plan that shares risks between group entities. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [domain]; Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: AmountsPayableRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amounts payable resulting from related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: AmountsReceivableRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amounts receivable resulting from related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: OutstandingCommitmentsMadeByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of outstanding commitments made by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: OutstandingCommitmentsMadeOnBehalfOfEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
Original.description: The amount of outstanding commitments made on behalf of the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: ProvisionsForDoubtfulDebtsRelatedToOutstandingBalancesOfRelatedPartyTransaction
Original.description: The amount of provisions for doubtful debts related to the amount of outstanding balances in related party transactions. [Refer: Provisions]

Original.name: ExpenseRecognisedDuringPeriodForBadAndDoubtfulDebtsForRelatedPartyTransaction
Original.description: The amount of expense recognised during the period in respect of bad or doubtful debts due from related parties. [Refer: Total for all related parties [member]]

Original.name: AmountIncurredByEntityForProvisionOfKeyManagementPersonnelServicesProvidedBySeparateManagementEntity
Original.description: The amount incurred by the entity for provision of key management personnel services that are provided by a separate management entity, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]; Separate management entities [domain]]

Original.name: Equity
Original.description: The amount of residual interest in the assets of the entity after deducting all its liabilities.

Original.name: ComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

Original.name: ProfitLoss
Original.description: The total of income less expenses from continuing and discontinued operations, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: RedesignatedFinancialAssetAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of financial assets redesignated to be measured at fair value through profit or loss on transition to IFRS Accounting Standards. [Refer: At fair value [member]; IFRSs [member]; Financial assets]

Original.name: RedesignatedFinancialLiabilityAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of financial liabilities redesignated as at fair value through profit or loss on transition to IFRS Accounting Standards. [Refer: At fair value [member]; IFRSs [member]; Financial liabilities]

Original.name: IntangibleAssetFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
Original.description: The amount of intangible assets for which fair value was used as their deemed cost in the opening IFRS Accounting Standard statement of financial position. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment, for which fair value was used as their deemed cost in the opening IFRS Accounting Standard statement of financial position. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: InvestmentPropertyFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
Original.description: The amount of investment property, for which fair value was used as deemed cost in the opening IFRS Accounting Standard statement of financial position. [Refer: Investment property]

Original.name: RightofuseAssetFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
Original.description: The amount of right-of-use assets for which fair value was used as their deemed cost in the opening IFRS Accounting Standard statement of financial position. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

Original.name: DeemedCostOfInvestmentsForWhichDeemedCostIsPreviousGAAPCarryingAmount
Original.description: The amount of aggregate deemed cost of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures or associates for which deemed cost is their previous GAAP carrying amount in the entity's first IFRS Accounting Standard financial statements. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Carrying amount [member]; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Previous GAAP [member]; Total for all subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates reported in separate financial statements; IFRSs [member]]

Original.name: DeemedCostOfInvestmentsForWhichDeemedCostIsFairValue
Original.description: The amount of aggregate deemed cost of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures or associates for which deemed cost is fair value in the entity's first IFRS Accounting Standard financial statements. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Total for all subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates reported in separate financial statements; IFRSs [member]]

Original.name: AdjustmentToCarryingAmountsReportedUnderPreviousGAAP
Original.description: The amount of aggregate adjustments to the carrying amounts reported under previous GAAP of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures or associates in the entity's first IFRS Accounting Standard financial statements. [Refer: Total for all associates [member]; Carrying amount [member]; Total for all joint ventures [member]; Previous GAAP [member]; Total for all subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates reported in separate financial statements; IFRSs [member]]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of tangible assets that: (a) are held for use in the production or supply of goods or services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes; and (b) are expected to be used during more than one period. Note that right-of-use assets are not included. [Contrast: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: AdditionsOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationsPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of additions to property, plant and equipment other than those acquired through business combinations. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The increase in property, plant and equipment resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment resulting from net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: DepreciationPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of depreciation of property, plant and equipment, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for property, plant and equipment, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossPropertyPlantAndEquipment

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomePropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income for property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income; Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomePropertyPlantAndEquipment

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersFromToInvestmentPropertyPropertyPlantAndEquipment

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesPropertyPlantAndEquipment

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesPropertyPlantAndEquipment

Original.name: DisposalsAndRetirementsPropertyPlantAndEquipment

Original.name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSalePropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment through classification as held for sale or inclusion in a disposal group classified as held for sale. [Refer: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Property, plant and equipment; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

Original.name: DecreaseThroughLossOfControlOfSubsidiaryPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment resulting from the loss of control of a subsidiary. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: ChangesInPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of tangible assets that: (a) are held for use in the production or supply of goods or services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes; and (b) are expected to be used during more than one period. Note that right-of-use assets are not included. [Contrast: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentExpendituresRecognisedForConstructions
Original.description: The amount of expenditures recognised in the carrying amount of an item of property, plant and equipment in the course of its construction. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentTemporarilyIdle
Original.description: The amount of temporarily idle property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossCarryingAmountFullyDepreciated
Original.description: The gross carrying amount of fully depreciated property, plant and equipment that is still in use. [Refer: Gross carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountOfAssetsRetiredFromActiveUse
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment retired from active use and not classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountOfRevaluedAssets
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment stated at revalued amounts. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountAtCostOfRevaluedAssets
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment that would have been recognised had the revalued assets been carried under the cost model. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRevaluationSurplus
Original.description: The amount of revaluation surplus that relates to property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Revaluation surplus]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets whose underlying assets would be presented as property, plant and equipment if they were owned. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Right-of-use assets]

Original.name: AdditionsOtherThanThroughBusinessCombinationsPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of additions to property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets other than those acquired through business combinations. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]; Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: AcquisitionsThroughBusinessCombinationsPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from acquisitions through business combinations. [Refer: Total for all business combinations [member]; Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from net exchange differences arising on the translation of the financial statements from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: DepreciationPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of depreciation of property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Depreciation and amortisation expense; Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss for property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in profit or loss; Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: RevaluationIncreaseDecreasePropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from revaluations to fair value. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets; Revaluation surplus]

Original.name: ImpairmentLossRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomePropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income for property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets. [Refer: Impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income; Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: ReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomePropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income for property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets. [Refer: Reversal of impairment loss recognised in other comprehensive income; Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from transfers. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersFromToInvestmentPropertyPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from transfers from (to) investment property. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets; Investment property]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersFromConstructionInProgressPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from transfers from construction in progress. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets; Construction in progress]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from transfers and changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: DisposalsPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from disposals. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: RetirementsPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from retirements. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: DisposalsAndRetirementsPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from disposals and retirements. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: DecreaseThroughClassifiedAsHeldForSalePropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets through classification as held for sale or inclusion in a disposal group classified as held for sale. [Refer: Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

Original.name: DecreaseThroughLossOfControlOfSubsidiaryPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The decrease in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets resulting from the loss of control of a subsidiary. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseInPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentIncludingRightofuseAssets
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment including right-of-use assets whose underlying assets would be presented as property, plant and equipment if they were owned. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Right-of-use assets]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRestrictionsOnTitle
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment subject to restrictions on title. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentPledgedAsSecurity
Original.description: The amount of property, plant and equipment pledged as security for liabilities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: ContractualCommitmentsForAcquisitionOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of contractual commitments for the acquisition of property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: CompensationFromThirdPartiesForItemsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
Original.description: The amount of compensation from third parties for items of property, plant and equipment that were impaired, lost or given up that is included in profit or loss, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss. [Refer: Profit (loss); Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: ProceedsIncludedInProfitOrLossInAccordanceWithParagraph20AOfIAS16ThatRelateToItemsProducedThatAreNotOutputOfEntitysOrdinaryActivities
Original.description: The amount of proceeds included in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 20A of IAS 16 that relate to items produced that are not an output of the entity's ordinary activities and are produced while bringing an item of property, plant and equipment to the location and condition necessary for it to be capable of operating in the manner intended by management, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: CostIncludedInProfitOrLossInAccordanceWithParagraph20AOfIAS16ThatRelatesToItemsProducedThatAreNotOutputOfEntitysOrdinaryActivities
Original.description: The amount of cost included in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 20A of IAS 16 that relates to items produced that are not an output of the entity's ordinary activities and are produced while bringing an item of property, plant and equipment to the location and condition necessary for it to be capable of operating in the manner intended by management, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: FairValueOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentMateriallyDifferentFromCarryingAmount
Original.description: The fair value of property, plant and equipment when the fair value is materially different from the carrying amount. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

Original.name: AssetsArisingFromExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResources
Original.description: The amount of assets arising from the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource.

Original.name: LiabilitiesArisingFromExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResources
Original.description: The amount of liabilities arising from the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource.

Original.name: IncomeArisingFromExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResources
Original.description: The amount of income arising from the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources, after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: ExpenseArisingFromExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResources
Original.description: The amount of expense arising from the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource, in the operating category in the statement of profit or loss.

Original.name: CashFlowsFromUsedInExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResourcesClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
Original.description: The cash flows from (used in) the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource, classified as operating activities.

Original.name: CashFlowsFromUsedInExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResourcesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
Original.description: The cash flows from (used in) the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource, classified as investing activities.

Original.name: AggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
Original.description: The aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price for financial instruments that is yet to be recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Classes of financial instruments [domain]]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNewTransactionsAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss resulting from new transactions. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Classes of financial instruments [domain]]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughAmountsRecognisedInProfitOrLossAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss resulting from amounts recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Classes of financial instruments [domain]]

Original.name: OtherIncreasesAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
Original.description: The increase in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Classes of financial instruments [domain]]

Original.name: OtherDecreasesAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
Original.description: The decrease in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Classes of financial instruments [domain]]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseInAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss]

Original.name: AggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
Original.description: The aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price for financial instruments that is yet to be recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Classes of financial instruments [domain]]

Original.name: MaximumExposureToCreditRisk
Original.description: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk without taking into account any collateral held or other credit enhancements (for example, netting agreements that do not qualify for offset in accordance with IAS 32). [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

Original.name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskFinancialInstrumentsToWhichImpairmentRequirementsInIFRS9AreNotApplied
Original.description: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk in relation to financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied. [Refer: Maximum exposure to credit risk]

Original.name: FinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of assets that are: (a) cash; (b) an equity instrument of another entity; (c) a contractual right: (i) to receive cash or another financial asset from another entity; or (ii) to exchange financial assets or financial liabilities with another entity under conditions that are potentially favourable to the entity; or (d) a contract that will, or may be, settled in the entity’s own equity instruments and is: (i) a non-derivative for which the entity is, or may be, obliged to receive a variable number of the entity’s own equity instruments; or (ii) a derivative that will, or may be, settled other than by the exchange of a fixed amount of cash or another financial asset for a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments. For this purpose the entity’s own equity instruments do not include puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16A-16B of IAS 32, instruments that impose on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation and are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32, or instruments that are contracts for the future receipt or delivery of the entity’s own equity instruments. [Refer: Classes of financial instruments [domain]; Financial liabilities]

Original.name: FinancialAssetsAtFairValue
Original.description: The fair value of financial assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial assets]

Original.name: NotionalAmount
Original.description: The nominal or face amount of a financial instrument, used to calculate payments made on that instrument.

Original.name: AllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of an allowance account used to record impairments to financial assets due to credit losses. [Refer: Financial assets]

Original.name: AdditionalAllowanceRecognisedInProfitOrLossAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of additional allowance for credit losses of financial assets recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

Original.name: UtilisationAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The decrease in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the utilisation of the allowance. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

Original.name: ReversalAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The decrease in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the reversal of impairment. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughNetExchangeDifferencesAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in an allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from the net exchange differences arising when the financial statements are translated from the functional currency into a different presentation currency, including the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughAdjustmentsArisingFromPassageOfTimeAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from adjustments arising from the passage of time. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseThroughOtherChangesAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in allowance account for credit losses of financial assets resulting from changes that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

Original.name: IncreaseDecreaseInAllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the allowance account used to record the impairment of financial assets due to credit losses. [Refer: Financial assets; Allowance account for credit losses of financial assets]

Original.name: AllowanceAccountForCreditLossesOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of an allowance account used to record impairments to financial assets due to credit losses. [Refer: Financial assets]

Original.name: ImpairmentLossOnFinancialAssets
Original.description: The amount of impairment loss on financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets; Impairment loss]

Original.name: RatedCreditExposures
Original.description: The amount of credit exposure that has been rated by external rating agencies. [Refer: Credit exposure]

Original.name: UnratedCreditExposures
Original.description: The amount of credit exposure that has not been rated by external rating agencies. [Refer: Credit exposure]

Original.name: CreditExposure
Original.description: The amount of exposure to loss resulting from credit risk. [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

Original.name: CreditExposure
Original.description: The amount of exposure to loss resulting from credit risk. [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

Original.name: FinancialLiabilities
Original.description: The amount of liabilities that are: (a) a contractual obligation: (i) to deliver cash or another financial asset to another entity; or (ii) to exchange financial assets or financial liabilities with another entity under conditions that are potentially unfavourable to the entity; or (b) a contract that will, or may be, settled in the entity’s own equity instruments and is: (i) a non-derivative for which the entity is, or may be, obliged to deliver a variable number of the entity’s own equity instruments; or (ii) a derivative that will, or may be, settled other than by the exchange of a fixed amount of cash or another financial asset for a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments. For this purpose, rights, options or warrants to acquire a fixed number of the entity’s own equity instruments for a fixed amount of any currency are equity instruments if the entity offers the rights, options or warrants pro rata to all of its existing owners of the same class of its own non-derivative equity instruments. Also, for those purposes the entity’s own equity instruments do not include puttable financial instruments that are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16A-16B of IAS 32, instruments that impose on the entity an obligation to deliver to another party a pro rata share of the net assets of the entity only on liquidation and are classified as equity instruments in accordance with paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32, or instruments that are contracts for the future receipt or delivery of the entity’s own equity instruments. As an exception, an instrument that meets the definition of a financial liability is classified as an equity instrument if it has all the features and meets the conditions in paragraphs 16A-16B or paragraphs 16C-16D of IAS 32. [Refer: Classes of financial instruments [domain]; Financial assets; Derivatives [member]]

Original.name: FinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValue
Original.description: The fair value of financial liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Financial liabilities]

Original.name: CarryingAmountOfNoncurrentLiabilitiesWithCovenants
Original.description: The carrying amount of a non-current liability with covenants arising from a loan arrangement for which the entity’s right to defer settlement is subject to the entity complying with covenants within twelve months after the reporting period.

Original.name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskOfLoansOrReceivables
Original.description: The maximum exposure to the credit risk of loans or receivables. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

Original.name: AmountByWhichLoansOrReceivablesRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstrumentsMitigateMaximumExposureToCreditRisk
Original.description: The amount by which credit derivatives or similar instruments related to loans or receivables mitigate maximum exposure to credit risk. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk; Derivatives [member]]

Original.name: ChangesInFairValueOfLoansOrReceivablesAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of loans or receivables that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the loans and receivables determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that gave rise to market risk; or (b) using an alternative method that the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]]

Original.name: AccumulatedChangesInFairValueOfLoanOrReceivableAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of loans or receivables that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the assets determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in the market conditions that gave rise to the market risk; or (b) using an alternative method the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Market risk [member]]

Original.name: ChangesInFairValueOfLoansOrReceivablesRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstruments
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to loans or receivables. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

Original.name: AccumulatedChangesInFairValueOfLoansOrReceivablesRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstruments
Original.description: The aggregate increase (decrease) in the fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to loans or receivables. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of loans or receivables related credit derivatives or similar instruments]

Original.name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The maximum exposure to the credit risk of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

Original.name: AmountByWhichFinancialAssetsRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstrumentsMitigateMaximumExposureToCreditRisk
Original.description: The amount by which credit derivatives or similar instruments related to financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss mitigate maximum exposure to credit risk. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Credit risk [member]; Derivatives [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk; Financial assets]

Original.name: ChangesInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of a financial asset (or group of financial assets) designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of that asset determined either: (a) as the amount of change in its fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that give rise to market risk ; or (b) using an alternative method the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Financial assets]

Original.name: AccumulatedChangesInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
Original.description: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the assets determined either: (a) as the amount of change in their fair value that is not attributable to changes in market conditions that gave rise to market risk; or (b) using an alternative method that the entity believes more faithfully represents the amount of change in its fair value that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the asset. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss, attributable to changes in credit risk of financial assets]

Original.name: ChangesInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstruments
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Financial assets]

Original.name: AccumulatedChangesInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsRelatedCreditDerivativesOrSimilarInstruments
Original.description: The accumulated increase (decrease) in fair value of credit derivatives or similar instruments related to financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss related credit derivatives or similar instruments; Financial assets]

Original.name: ChangesInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfLiability
Original.description: The increase (decrease) in the fair value of a financial liability that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of that liability. [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

Original.name: AccumulatedChangesInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangesInCreditRiskOfLiability
Original.description: The accumulated increase (decrease) in the fair value of financial liabilities that is attributable to changes in the credit risk of the liabilities. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Market risk [member]; Increase (decrease) in fair value of financial liability, attributable to changes in credit risk of liability]

Original.name: DifferenceBetweenCarryingAmountOfFinancialLiabilityAndAmountContractuallyRequiredToPayAtMaturityToHolderOfObligation
Original.description: The amount by which the carrying amount of a financial liability is more (less) than the amount that the entity would be contractually required to pay at maturity to the holder of the obligation. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

Original.name: TransfersOfCumulativeGainLossWithinEquity
Original.description: The amount of transfers within equity of the cumulative gain (loss) on financial liabilities designated as at fair value through profit or loss for which changes in the liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: AmountPresentedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeRealisedAtDerecognition
Original.description: The amount presented in other comprehensive income that was realised at derecognition of financial liabilities designated at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: FairValueOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: FairValueOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The amount of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: DividendsRecognisedForInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeHeldAtEndOfReportingPeriod
Original.description: The amount of dividends related to investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

Original.name: DividendsRecognisedForInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeDerecognisedDuringPeriod
Original.description: The amount of dividends related to investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income, derecognised during the reporting period. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated as measured at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsHeldAtEndOfReportingPeriod
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9 and held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax, gains (losses) from investments in equity instruments]

Original.name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDerecognisedDuringPeriod
Original.description: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9 and derecognised during the reporting period. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax, gains (losses) from investments in equity instruments]

Original.name: FairValueOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeAtDateOfDerecognition
Original.description: The fair value at the date of the derecognition of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]]

Original.name: CumulativeGainLossOnDisposalOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
Original.description: The cumulative gain (loss) on disposal of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

Original.name: TransfersOfCumulativeGainLossWithinEquityWhenInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeAreDerecognisedDuringPeriod
Original.description: The amount of transfers of the cumulative gain or loss within equity when investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income are derecognised during the period.

Original.name: ReclassificationOutOfFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of financial assets reclassified out of the at fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: ReclassificationIntoFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
Original.description: The amount of financial assets reclassified into the at fair value through profit or loss category. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

Original.name: ReclassificationOutOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
